Our prediction for the next decade: - Only ~10 projects survive. - Capitalization of them will be similar to top IT companies. - Adoption will be ~10-40%. - dApps will be popular and useful. - There will have alternatives to banks. - We will still operate our #Cardano pool.  https://t.co/QHBhSeEa7B

Just catching up on my year-end review. Fascinating to look at the 2019 returns of the Bitwise 10 constituents. Five assets posted positive returns for the year, five posted negative returns. 250% spread between the best-performing (Tezos) and the worst (Cardano). Index up 52%.  https://t.co/NNpRA0WTBr
